Description.Name: Misjump Partial Extensive Repairs Completed
Description.Details: Darius approaches you on the bridge, "Commander, I have been informed that the repairs to the damaged drives have been completed. Aside from the Console being offline, the Argo itself is now back to 100% efficiency." You nod, "Thank you, Darius. What do we need to do to bring the Console back online?" Farah, standing over by the Kerby-Fucheatah Console with some tools looks up from the open panel, "Well, we need the three key parts for the console: A set of Kerby Injectors, a Fu Capacitor and a functional Cheatah NavCom."

Description.Name: Replace the Parts
Description.Details: Install New Parts to Fix Console

Description.Name: Replacement Parts
Description.Details: You frown, "So get the parts from storage and replace them." Farah grabs her noteputer and scans the inventory. A few moments later she finds what she is looking for, "Excellent!! We're in luck Commander. We do have all the parts needed to repair the Console. It shouldn't take the Techs and myself more than a few days to get everything up and running." You smile broadly, "Excellent news Farah! Go ahead and schedule the work order." The KF Console is under repairsSTATUS: OFFLINE.

Description.Name: Need Parts
Description.Details: You frown, "So get the parts from storage and replace them." Farah grabs her noteputer and scans the inventory. A few moments later, she turns to you shaking her head, "Commander, it appears we do not have enough of the needed parts in storage to repair the Console." You look over at the other bridge crew, "Well, anyone got any ideas where we can get more of these parts?" Darius chimes in, "We obtained the original parts from some key contracts for some of the various pirates out in the abandoned systems. We could head out there and see if any of their command is feeling generous." Yang clears his throat, "We maybe don't need to go all guns blazing and what not. I've found that certain planets, namely those that have a shadier mercantile presence, will almost always have what you need, for a price in C-Bills." You sit back in your command chair, "So now we are on a bloody treasure hunt..." The KF Console is still non-functionalSTATUS: OFFLINE.

Description.Name: Delay Console Repair
Description.Details:
You respond to Darius, "Thank you, Darius.  I think we best hold off some more for now until we are in a better position to warrant the repairs on the Console."

Darius nods, "As you wish, Commander."
